title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 623/86 of 28 February 1986 determining the accession compensatory amounts applicable from 1 March 1986 to trade in goods covered by Regulations (EEC) No 3033/80 and (EEC) No 3035/80
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) N° 623/86 of 28 February  1986 determining the accession compensatory amounts applicable from 1 March 1986 to trade in goods  covered by Regulations (EEC) N° 3033/80 and (EEC) N° 3035/80
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The accession compensatory amounts applicable to exports of goods covered by Regulation  (EEC) N° 3035/80 from the Community of Ten to Spain shall be as set out in column 3 of Annex I to  this Regulation.
The accession compensatory amounts applicable to exports of goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N°  3035/80 from the Community of Ten to Portugal shall be as set out in column 4 of Annex I to this  Regulation.

The accession compensatory amounts applicable to imports of goods covered by Regulation  (EEC) N° 3033/80 into the Community of Ten from Spain shall be as set out in column 2 of Annex II  to this Regulation.
The accession compensatory amounts applicable to imports of goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N°  3033/80 into the Community of Ten from Portugal shall be as set out in column 3 of Annex II to this  Regulation.

On the exportation of goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3035/80 from the Kingdom of  Spain to third countries, the export refund calculated in accordance with the provisions of the  said Regulation shall be increased or reduced, as the case may be, by the accession compensatory  amount set out in column 3 of Annex III to this Regulation.
On the exportation of goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3035/80 from the Portuguese Republic to  third countries, the export refund calculated in accordance with the provisions of the said  Regulation shall be increased or reduced, as the case may be, by the accession compensatory amount  set out in column 4 of Annex III to this Regulation.

Where goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3033/80 are imported into the Kingdom of  Spain from third countries, the variable component applied by the Community of Ten and calculated  in accordance with Regulation (EEC) N° 3033/80 shall be increased or reduced, as the case may be,  by the accession compensatory amount set out in column 2 of Annex IV to this Regulation.
Where goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3033/80 are imported into the Portuguese Republic from  third countries, the variable component applied by the Community of Ten and calculated in  accordance with Regulation (EEC) N° 3033/80 shall be increased or reduced, as the case may be, by  the accession compensatory amount set out in column 3 of Annex IV to this Regulation.

The accession compensatory amounts granted on the exportation from the Kingdom of Spain  of goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3035/80 of the Portuguese Republic shall be as set out in  column 3 of Annex V to this Regulation.
The accession compensatory amounts granted on the exportation from the Portuguese Republic of goods  covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3035/80 of the Kingdom of Spain shall be as set out in column 4 of  Annex V to this Regulation.

The accession compensatory amounts levied on the importation into the Kingdom of Spain  of goods covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3033/80 from the Portuguese Republic shall be as set out in  column 2 of Annex VI to this Regulation.
The accession compensatory amounts levied on the importation into the Portuguese Republic of goods  covered by Regulation (EEC) N° 3033/80 from the Kingdom of Spain shall be as set out in column 3 of  Annex VI to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1986.
For the CommissionCOCKFIELDVice-President
(1)OJ N° L 302, 15. 11. 1985.
(2)OJ N° L 323, 29. 11. 1980, p. 1.
(3)OJ N° L 323, 29. 11. 1980, p. 27.
